Job Description:
1. Support the update and revision of EHS documents in accordance with company standards.
2. Conduct initial review of procedures, work instructions, and forms to ensure compliance with current regulatory requirements.
3. Maintain and update the EHS document master list, including version control, revision date, status, and responsible PIC.
4. Collect data and information from relevant departments to support document revision and EHS analysis activities.
5. Coordinate with internal teams to ensure each document update is validated and approved by the designated PIC and management.
